About AGT

ShitFace Inu’s mission is to bring new cryptocurrency concepts to mainstream investors. Unlike older, comparable projects, $SFINU introduces holders to next-generation concepts such as Staking & Farming, NFTs with utility and rewards and more.

A BEP20 (BSC) meme token that promotes healthy and widespread growth and usage through the ecosystem built around the $SFINU brand as well as specific rewards linked to users’ transactions involving decentralized wallets and other utilities such as staking and farming.
